body: I put long first for this reason because all the current usages use longs, so it will be the most common.  Also thought string would be more common than device, because most people probably just do `device='cuda'` or whatever.
body_html: I put long first for this reason because all the current usages use longs, so it will be the most common. Also thought string would be more common than device, because most people probably just do device='cuda' or whatever.
body_text: I put long first for this reason because all the current usages use longs, so it will be the most common.  Also thought string would be more common than device, because most people probably just do device='cuda' or whatever.
